title: 3rd I Film Festival South Asian Film Festival: Bollywood and Beyond (Ron Morgan)
text: By Ron Morgan Oct 23, 2015 From intellectual classics to documentary films, from novel and experimental visualizations to next-level Bollywood: 3rd i Films is dedicated to encouraging varied images of South Asians through self-governing film. We display films from India and other countries and also the worldwide South Asian Diaspora. 3rd i's programs reveal the existences and capabilities of the many cultural, spiritual and national personalities that involve the South Asian identity, and support communication and discussion both within the South Asian community and with other native and universal communities. Get a taxicab or you can call to book a taxi sf for yourself.The premiere yearly South Asian film festival in the United States, the San Francisco International South Asian Film Festival (SFISAFF) has fetched the filmic legacy and values of South Asia to the Bay Area viewers for more than 10 years. Offered by 3rd i Films, the oldest South Asian media arts association in the U.S., the carnival encourages varied images of South Asians and stimulates variation through independent film. This year the grand festival is going to take place from 22nd of October 2015 to 25th of October 2015 in San Francisco and 1st of November 2015 in Palo Alto. You can hire taxi services to get you to the magnificent festival. This year's 'Focus on Freedoms' is going to bring you the inspirational stories from the front lines of the fight for gender fairness, and also inspecting the legacy of freedom for India and Pakistan. Art cinema comprising of latest, classic& comedies from both Indie& Bollywood catch a room on the program. The filmmakers of the Bay Area and the live presentations will be making a strong screening at the festival as well. Festival Passes and tickets for separable films can now be availed online through our ticketing portal on Eventbrite: thirdi.eventbrite.com. We commend purchasing tickets online early as The New People Cinema has limited number of seats than our previous sites and some presentations will certainly sell out in advance. Online tickets are available only for $10 per film. But at-the-door tickets can be availed for $13 per film. You can buy the passes only online. Refer to eventbrite profile page for all ticket/pass preferences. You will be sent your ticket or passes through an email in case of any changes to the plan. You cannot avail any sort of exchanges, reprints or refunds on pass & ticket purchases. Book a taxi San Francisco to arrange the transportation for you.You can also download the eventbrite app on your mobile phones. It is the fast and secure mode to purchase and pile your festival tickets. Explore for "3rdifilms" by adjusting the location setting to "San Francisco" and filtering by "Date" to get a linear listing of all the festival films and events. For any queries related to the festival ticketing, please write us to 3rditickets@gmail.com. In case you have any questions or doubts related to the Eventbrite system, feel free to contact the Eventbrite helpdesk. So, get ready to come to the Festival. About the Author Ron Morgan is the market representative for Luxor Cab. Luxor Cab is part of the San Francisco community for taxi cab service.
